title.narrative: Chongqing Innovation and Human Capital Development Project

description.narrative: The project is located in Chongqing, a centrally administered municipality in the Chengdu-Chongqing city cluster at the upper reaches of the Yangtze River. Chongqing's resource-based inefficient economy is impacting the environment, and it prioritizes innovation in promoting sustainable development to shift from heavily polluting industries to innovation-driven industries across all economic sectors. The project will (i) help the people in Chongqing gain industry-relevant and innovation-oriented skills and capacities for employment; and (ii) support institutions to create an enabling and inclusive environment that helps build an innovative, diversified, efficient, and green economy in Chongqing.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
At least two ETDAs have been opened to demonstrate the green, human-centered, and gender-inclusive facilities to the public as green innovation hubs at least three times per month
